channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: #BREAKING Netanyahu says told Blinken Israel will go into Rafah even without US support.
item.description:
#BREAKING Netanyahu says told Blinken Israel will go into Rafah even without US support pic.twitter.com/Zk4vzkfQiE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 周五在萨尔巴赫（Saalbach）举行的世界杯总决赛上，瑞士超级障碍赛选手马可-奥德马特（Marco Odermatt）和拉拉-古特-贝赫拉米（Lara Gut-Behrami）双双获得速度项目的榜首。
item.description:
There was double Swiss super-G delight at the World Cup finals in Saalbach on Friday as both Marco Odermatt and Lara Gut-Behrami finished atop the speed discipline's standings.#AFPSports https://t.co/mLNuUsa7Ge

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：新西兰老人聚在一起喝茶，完成一项重要任务：DIY 制作有朝一日他们自己使用的棺材。
item.description:
VIDEO: Elderly New Zealanders meet for cups of tea and a task of grave importance: building DIY caskets that they will one day use themselves. pic.twitter.com/s8o90zXoD1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 联合国的一份报告周五警告说，世界需要更好地管理淡水资源，但如果不加以控制，被吹捧为解决方案的饥渴新技术可能会导致 "严重问题"。
item.description:
The world needs to better manage its freshwater resources but thirsty new technologies touted as solutions could lead to "serious problems" if left unchecked, a UN report warned Friday.https://t.co/nj2YCqZi9A

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：时隔近三十年后，一个因描述制裁下的残酷生活而被萨达姆-侯赛因禁止播出的伊拉克电视节目重回荧屏。"瓦希巴的世界 "是伊拉克的一个节目，主要关注吸毒、犯罪、离婚和失业等社会问题。
item.description:
VIDEO: After nearly three decades, an Iraqi TV programme banned by Saddam Hussein for its gritty depiction of life under sanctions has returned to screens. "Wahiba's World" is an Iraqi show focusing on social issues such as drug addiction, crime, divorce and unemployment. pic.twitter.com/7SDvrAuVVN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 随着军政府将美国赶出尼日尔，莫斯科正在争夺对尼日尔的更大影响力，这也是随着西方军事存在的减少，俄罗斯在该地区的最新行动。
item.description:
Moscow is vying for greater influence in Niger as the military junta moves to push out the United States, Russia's latest swoop in the region as the West's military presence thins.https://t.co/XhuJTGFj3T

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：越南檳椥省因長期熱浪和鹽水入侵導致淡水短缺，嚴重影響農作物和當地農民的生計。
item.description:
VIDEO: A prolonged heatwave and saline intrusion are causing a shortage of fresh water in Vietnam's Ben Tre province, badly affecting crops and the livelihoods of local farmers. pic.twitter.com/fMKX5AJfZL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 英国首相苏纳克周五介入了耐克公司出售的一件新款英格兰球衣的争论，这件球衣改变了圣乔治十字架的颜色，他说 "我们不应该 "乱用国旗。
item.description:
British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak on Friday waded into a row over a new England football shirt sold by Nike that changes the colours of the St George's Cross, saying "we shouldn't mess" with national flags.#AFPSports https://t.co/u1l6gia5ou pic.twitter.com/zc6sGOlUk3

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：印度尼西亚度假胜地巴厘岛上的一个海滩通常是纯净的，但现在却垃圾成堆--每年的季风都会造成这一惨景，令游客苦恼不已，当地官员也在争分夺秒地清理垃圾。
item.description:
VIDEO: A normally pristine beach on Indonesia's resort island of Bali is awash with garbage - a bleak annual event caused by the yearly monsoon which has left tourists vexed and local officials scrambling to clean up. pic.twitter.com/22XhLTRCj2

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 周五，中国试图阻止联合国人权理事会就一名十年前试图前往理事会而被拘留并死亡的持不同政见者发表声明。
item.description:
China tried Friday to block a statement before the UN Human Rights Council about a dissident who was detained and died after trying to travel to the council a decade ago.https://t.co/XwVaMdWsvJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：在南半球秋季的第一天，热浪继续肆虐巴西，标志性的伊帕内玛海滩挤满了人。周日，里约热内卢的高温指数达到 62.3 摄氏度，为十年来最高。
item.description:
VIDEO: The iconic Ipanema beach is packed with people as a heat wave continues to stifle Brazil on the first day of the fall season in the southern hemisphere. On Sunday, Rio de Janeiro's heat index hit 62.3 degrees Celsius, the highest in a decade. pic.twitter.com/W9MGjMYZt3

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 世界上最大的郁金香花园于本周四向公众开放，这是它的第 75 次开放，预计将有数十万人在荷兰西部城市里斯欣赏到令人眼花缭乱的 700 万株郁金香。
item.description:
The world's biggest tulip garden opened to the public on Thursday for its 75th edition, with hundreds of thousands of people expected to enjoy a bewildering array of seven million bulbs in the western Dutch city of Lisse.https://t.co/lpqbY7UQ6b pic.twitter.com/QRlzZ5cJLi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：马拉加毕加索博物馆举办新展览 "巴勃罗-毕加索：发明的结构。作品的统一性"，这是巴勃罗-毕加索 141 件作品收藏的全新展示。
item.description:
VIDEO: Picasso Museum of Malaga presents its new exhibition 'Pablo Picasso: Structures of Invention. The Unity of a Work', a new presentation of the collection of 141 works by Pablo Picasso. pic.twitter.com/h9L2rKYcwJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 周五，德国足球放弃阿迪达斯作为其球衣供应商的决定在柏林引发了不满，德国经济部长指责阿迪达斯转向美国运动服装巨头耐克缺乏 "爱国主义"。
item.description:
German football's decision to drop Adidas as its kit supplier sparked dismay in Berlin on Friday, with the economy minister blasting the switch to US sportswear giant Nike as a lack of "patriotism".#AFPSports https://t.co/Cz5vAFkLTG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：菲律宾单身母亲玛丽-安-爱德华特（Mary Ann Eduarte）数年来一直推迟乳腺癌化疗，转而服用社交媒体上虚假宣传的能治疗致命疾病的食物补充剂。这些保健品不起作用，癌症扩散到了她的肺部和骨骼。
item.description:
VIDEO: Filipino single mother Mary Ann Eduarte delayed chemotherapy for her breast cancer for several years and instead took food supplements falsely promoted on social media as cures for the deadly disease. They didn't work and the cancer spread to her lungs and bones. pic.twitter.com/Lb5dobo6yp

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 周五的一项重要调查显示，3月份德国企业士气的上升势头比预期更为强劲，这为受危机冲击的欧洲第一大经济体带来了 "曙光"。
item.description:
German business morale rose more strongly than expected in March, a key survey showed Friday, raising hope there is "light on the horizon" for Europe's crisis-hit top economy.https://t.co/BdE3Hj2S44

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：海地首都太子港的安全局势损害了小店主的生意，他们正为生计而苦苦挣扎。
item.description:
VIDEO: The security situation in Haiti's capital Port-au-Prince is undermining the business of small shopkeepers, who are struggling to make ends meet. pic.twitter.com/8OY8zl1SVm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 捷克单板滑雪运动员埃斯特-莱德卡（Ester Ledecka）变身速度型选手，周五在萨尔巴赫举行的世界杯决赛中赢得了女子超级障碍赛冠军。
item.description:
Ester Ledecka, the Czech snowboarder turned speedster, won the women's super-G at the World Cup finals at Saalbach on Friday.#AFPSports https://t.co/GVCrUYdUIV

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：被鲨鱼咬伤的情况极为罕见，科学家们希望更多人了解这一事实，尤其是在鲨鱼数量不断减少、亟待保护的情况下。
item.description:
VIDEO: Shark bites are exceedingly rare, a fact scientists wish more people knew, especially amid declining shark populations desperately in need of conservation. pic.twitter.com/gUTqxAdVaG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：游客和华盛顿特区居民参观著名的潮汐盆地（Tidal Basin），樱花提前进入盛花期，这是百年来第二早的盛花期。
item.description:
VIDEO: Tourists and Washington D.C. residents visit the famed Tidal Basin as cherry blossom trees reach an early peak bloom, the second-earliest one on record in a century. pic.twitter.com/qxUp3nYgQN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 在入侵乌克兰两年后的周五，俄罗斯承认自己 "处于战争状态"，并对邻国领土发动了大规模导弹和无人机袭击。
item.description:
Russia admitted two years into its invasion of Ukraine on Friday that it was "in a state of war," as it launched a massive wave of missile and drone attacks on its neighbour's territory.https://t.co/3OvftJjTHM pic.twitter.com/LvAFnIwnow

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：维奥莱特-查奇（Violet Chachki）是有史以来第一位在巴黎传说中的疯马歌舞厅跳舞的男性变装皇后，她希望自己的出现能帮助 "传播 "她自己从变装中获得的 "治疗"。
item.description:
VIDEO: Violet Chachki is the first male-bodied drag queen ever to dance at the fabled Crazy Horse cabaret in Paris, where she hopes her appearance will help "spread the therapy" she herself got from drag. pic.twitter.com/PG8VulHO2x

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 报纸剪报、书籍和自称访问过其他星球的人的第一手资料被编入瑞典一个巨大的超自然现象档案馆，吸引着世界各地的好奇者和研究人员。
item.description:
Newspaper clippings, books and first-hand accounts of people who said they visited other planets are catalogued in a giant Swedish archive on paranormal phenomena, attracting the curious and researchers from around the world.https://t.co/pXlYNJiTpJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：智利律师贡萨洛-蒋（Gonzalo Chiang）和他的狗萨姆（Sam）在圣地亚哥圣克里斯托瓦尔山（Cerro San Cristobal）的山路上散步时收集塑料垃圾。蒋正在努力推广 "plogging"（慢跑时捡拾垃圾）的做法。
item.description:
VIDEO: Chilean lawyer Gonzalo Chiang and his dog Sam collect plastic waste as they walk the trails of Cerro San Cristobal in Santiago. Chiang is on a quest to promote the practice of "plogging" -- picking up litter while jogging. pic.twitter.com/P855zdtwKC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 马来西亚政府表示，由于成本问题，马来西亚已决定不再主办 2026 年英联邦运动会，这对被一些人视为过时的运动会来说是一个新的打击。
item.description:
Malaysia has decided against hosting the 2026 Commonwealth Games because of the cost, the government said, in a fresh blow to an event seen as outdated by some.#AFPSports https://t.co/842ljIqjX7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：在肯尼亚的烈日下，马赛族妇女在乞力马扎罗山山麓的广袤平原上巡逻，她们决心保护野生动物，打击偷猎者。但对许多人来说，与社区内的古老偏见作斗争同样重要。
item.description:
VIDEO: Under the blazing Kenyan sun, Maasai women patrol the vast plains in the foothills of Mount Kilimanjaro, determined to protect wildlife and tackle poachers. But for many, fighting age-old prejudices within their community is just as important. pic.twitter.com/2WZAnZzvaJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: #克里姆林宫称欧盟可能因冻结资产计划而面临 "严重后果"。
item.description:
#BREAKING Kremlin says EU risks 'serious consequences' over frozen assets plan pic.twitter.com/qB5NKkunlV

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：被毁坏的阿尼城位于世界上最敏感的边界之一，这座摇摇欲坠的桥梁象征着土耳其和亚美尼亚之间的关系。历史学家希望，修复这座桥可以修复两国之间的关系。
item.description:
VIDEO: The ruined city of Ani stands on one of the world's most sensitive borders, a crumbling bridge symbolising the state of relations between Turkey and Armenia. Historians hope that restoring it could repair ties between the two countries. pic.twitter.com/vpbIQ2zVes

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频："Change The Punchline！"是在布加勒斯特举办的为期一个月的全女性单口相声驻场演出。目的是鼓励新一代罗马尼亚女性喜剧演员开启自己的职业生涯。
item.description:
VIDEO: "Change The Punchline!" is a month-long all-female stand-up comedy residency in Bucharest. The aim: to encourage a new generation of female Romanian comedians to kick off their career. pic.twitter.com/YXyCWhCuVb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: #AFP 本周图片（3 月 16-22 日）
item.description:
#AFP PICTURES OF THE WEEK (March 16-22) https://t.co/oz4x76nN2G pic.twitter.com/trMFKR90to

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 22, 2024
